title: Font identification help
content:
If anyone can identify this font, I would greatly appreciate it.  
I have found so many which are similar , but just can't lock onto the exact match.

Thanks!

Sorry about the poor quality image, it is the largest that I could find.  
It comes from Labor arts and culture magazine [http://www.revistalabor.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021043424/http:/www.revistalabor.com/).

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-04-27 at 5.03.31 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021043424/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-04-27%20at%205.03.31%20PM.png) | 10.54 KB |
author: Joseph Johnson
